form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: PETITION TO CLASSIFY STATUS OF ALIEN RELATIVE FOR ISSUANCE OF IMMIGRANT VISA, 443-R01.4

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/2/2023 Form approved. 2-43 Budget Bureau No. 43. R401.4. Date filed PETITION TO CLASSIFY STATUS OF ALIEN RELATIVE FOR ISST CE OF IMMI- FEB 17 1971 adidas redeived ANT VISA O ALBEI- 1971 To THE SECRETARY OF STATE: The petition was filed on FEB 17.1971 American Vice Consul Remarks PPT#Y954612 The petition Is approved for status under section: Following documents seen and resurred Proof of citizenship/PF status SPOUSE, 201 (b) CHILD 203(a) 12) DATE UNITEDSHATES Marriage certificate OF 201 (b) PARENT William Divorce decree, petitioner ACTION Divorce decree, beneficiary 203 (a) (a) DD Birth certificate, petitioner Birth certificate, beneficiary DISTRICT Yaswan 203 (a) (1) Household registration 203 (a) (5) (PETITIONER IS WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE) 1. Petition is hereby made to classify the status of the alien beneficiary for issuance of an immigrant visa as: (Check one) The spouse, child (regardless of age), parent, brother, or sister of a United States citizen. The spouse or unmarried child (regardless of age) of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence. Block I. - Information About Alien Beneficiary 2. Name (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 3.DoNot Write in This Space 4. Relationship of beneficiary to petitioner Hwang Jen Du Father 5. Other names used; Married woman give maiden name 6. Is beneficiary related to you by adoption? None No 9. Beneficiary's marital status: 7. Place of birth (Country) 8. Date of birth (Month, day, year) 38 Fukien China October 27 1914 Married Widowed Divorced Single 10. Petitioner's name (Last In CAPS) 11. Has this beneficiary ever been in the U.S.? (First) (Middle) Haaren Wanda Hwang Yes No 12. Name of beneficiary's spouse, if married, and date and country of birth (Omit this item if petition is for your spouse) Lin Hui Ying Deceased 13. Names, birthdates and countries of birth of beneficiary's children, if any Hwang Shuan Tin, July 20 1940 Fukien, China. Hwang Shuan Hai Mav 5 1946 Fukien China. Hwang Yen Luan October 22 1945 Fukien China. FOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b)(6) 14. Full address of beneficiary's spouse and children, if any (Omit this Item if petition is for your spouse) N/A 15. If this petition is for your spouse or child, give the following: a. Date and place of your present marriage b. Number of your prior marriages c. Number of prior marriages of spouse N/A d. Last address at which you and your spouse resided together From To (Town or city) (State or Province) (Country) (Apt. No.) (Number and street) (Month) (Year) (Month) (Year) N/A 16. If this petition is for a child, (a). Is the child married? (b) Is the child your adopted child? If so, give the names, dates, and places of birth of all other children adopted by you. If none, so state 17. If this petition is for a brother or sister, are both your parents the same as the alien's parents? If not, submit a separate statement giving full details as to parentage, dates of marriage of parents, and the number of previous marriages of each parent. 18. If separate petitions are also being submitted for other relatives, give names Hwang Shuan Tin, Hwang Shuan Hai Brother. FOIA (b)(6) 19. Have you ever filed a petition for this alien before? No If so, give place and date of filing and result: DISCOL Form I-130 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE - Immigration and Naturalization Service (Rev. 10-15-09)
